Lelylan Dashboard

Lelylan Dashboard comes to life to give you a simple and easy to use way to monitor and control any device in your house. Try the demo out to see it in action.

Search box Categories Detailed view Devices list

Creating a Device

When you access the first time to the dashboard you don't have any device. To create one click the create device link and fill the form with the required fields.

  • Name - Device name
  • Type - Device type defining the device structure
  • Physical - Physical device URI related you want to control (leave it empty to simulate the device)
Create device Type selection

When you click on type selection, you are redirected to the type selection page. Here you can see three options that will let you choose between popular types or your types. Once you have decided the type for your device simply click over it.

Types lists Details link

If you want to better check any type definition click on the details link. A detailed definition of the type will show up, giving you the ability to show the type structure and to see a simple device simulation. To select the visualized type click on the select this type link.

Selection type link

Do I need the physical device URI?

If you want to connect the physical world, you need to fill the physical field. Here you can find an introductive article showing you how to create your first connected device. In case you do not have a physical device to connect do not warry, you can leave the field empty and simulate the device behaviour.
